synopsis.text: Humanity has transformed Mars into a vast ocean, with colossal city-ships serving as the only means of survival amidst rampant crime, poverty, and corruption. In response to the government's tyranny, numerous individuals have embraced the life of a pirate, with the infamous Ship of Aurora and its crew drawing the attention of the ruling Earth Government. To suppress their rebellious activities, an elite squadron of military pilots, equipped with formidable combat mechas known as Round Bucklers, has been deployed to eradicate the pirates. Caught in the crossfire, a young man named Gram finds himself entangled with the notorious pirates of Mars, discovering a newfound affinity for their cause as they search for the legendary treasure hidden beneath the icy seas. As the battle between the Earth Government and the pirates intensifies, Gram and his newfound allies must navigate the treacherous waters of Mars, evading not only the military but also rival pirates and bounty hunters in their quest for the elusive treasure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
